headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID

parameters.name: rules
parameters.description: List of rules

parameters.name: apply_objects
parameters.description: Objects that you want to apply the rules to. Objects can be campaigns, ad groups, or ads.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Category of the object. Enum values: CAMPAIGN , ADGROUP , AD .

parameters.name: dimension_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the objects.

parameters.name: pre_condition_type
parameters.description: Conditions to filter objects that you want to include. SELECTED : Only include those that are selected by IDs. ALL_ACTIVE_CAMPAIGN : Select all active campaigns. ALL_ACTIVE_AD_GROUP : Select all active ad groups. ALL_ACTIVE_AD : Select all active ads. ALL_ACTIVE_AD_GROUP_UNDER_SELECTED : Select all active ad groups under the selected campaign. ALL_ACTIVE_AD_UNDER_SELECTED : Select all active ads under selected dimensions ALL_INACTIVE_CAMPAIGN : Select all inactive campaigns. ALL_INACTIVE_AD_GROUP : Select all inactive ad groups ALL_INACTIVE_AD : Select all inactive ads. ALL_INACTIVE_AD_GROUP_UNDER_SELECTED : Select all inactive ad groups under the selected campaign. ALL_INACTIVE_AD_UNDER_SELECTED : Select all inactive ads under the selected campaign or ad group (specified by dimension and dimension_ids )

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.description: Conditions

parameters.name: subject_type
parameters.description: Subjects that the condition will be based on. Enum values: COST DAILY_BUDGET_SPENDING_RATE LIFETIME_BUDGET_SPENDING_RATE IMPRESSION CLICK CONVERSION CONVERSION_SKAN CVR CVR_SKAN CPA CPM CPC CTR COST_PER_RESULT RESULT RESULT_RATE BID_STRATEGY : values must be one of these: COST_CAP , BID_CAP , MAX_CONVERSION , LOWEST_COST . OPTIMIZATION_GOAL : values must be one of these: CONVERT , CLICK , SHOW , REACH , INSTALL , IN_APP_EVENT , LEAD_GENERATION , TWO_SECOND_VIDEO_VIEW , SIX_SECOND_VIDEO_VIEW OBJECTIVE : values must be one of these: TRAFFIC , APP_PROMOTION , WEB_CONVERSIONS , VIDEO_VIEWS , REACH , LEAD_GENERATION NAME DAYS_SINCE_CREATION : match_type should be one of GT , LT , BETWEEN , MATCH . NO_CONDITION : Be careful when setting a rule without any conditions to avoid any unintended changes. ROAS_PURCHASE ROAS_IMPRESSION_ADS ROAS_PURCHASE_SKAN ROAS_COMPLETE_PAYMENT ROAS_PURCHASES_ONSITE NOT_REAL_TIME_CPA NOT_REAL_TIME_CONVERSION NOT_REAL_TIME_CVR

parameters.name: range_type
parameters.description: Time range for the condition. Enum values: TODAY YESTERDAY PAST_THREE_DAYS PAST_FIVE_DAYS PAST_SEVEN_DAYS LIFETIME

parameters.name: match_type
parameters.description: Operator to connect a condition with a value. Enum values: GT (greater than), LT (less than), BETWEEN , MATCH . Only when subject_type is NAME , can below match_type be used: CONTAINS NOT_CONTAINS START_WITH END_WITH STRING_EQUAL

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Values for the condition. If match_type is BETWEEN , include two values in this array Note : Verification rules for the values field vary with the subject_type you pass in. See Verification Rules for values for details.

parameters.name: calculation_type
parameters.description: The subject_type has to be COST . Set to OF_EACH_OBJECT by default if this field is not provided. ALL_OBJECTS OF_EACH_OBJECT

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: Actions to be taken when the condition is met.

parameters.name: subject_type
parameters.description: Type of actions to take. Enum: TURN_ON , TURN_OFF , MESSAGE , DAILY_BUDGET , LIFETIME_BUDGET , BID .

parameters.name: action_type
parameters.description: Enum values: INCREASE , DECREASE , ADJUST_TO .

parameters.name: value_type
parameters.description: Enum values: EXACT , PERCENT .

parameters.name: value conditional
parameters.description: The budget value. Required when subject_type = DAILY_BUDGET , LIFETIME_BUDGET or BID .

parameters.name: value conditional
parameters.description: The budget value you want to increase, decrease or adjust to. If action_type = INCREASE or DECREASE , value range:[0.01, 1000000000000]. If action_type = ADJUST_TO : when dimension = CAMPAIGN , value range: [50, 1000000000000]. when dimension = ADGROUP , value range: [20, 1000000000000].

parameters.name: limit conditional
parameters.description: The maximum budget cap (if action_type = INCREASE ) or minimum budget ( if action_type = DECREASE ). Required when action_type = INCREASE or DECREASE . When dimension = CAMPAIGN , value range: [50, 1000000000000]. When dimension = ADGROUP , value range: [20, 1000000000000]. If action_type = ADJUST_TO , you don't need to pass in this field.

parameters.name: frequency_info
parameters.description: Frequency settings. It can be used when the action subject_type is DAILY_BUDGET , LIFETIME_BUDGET , or BID .

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Enum values: ONLY_ONCE ONCE_IN_24_H ONCE_IN_48_H ONCE_IN_1_W CUSTOM

parameters.name: custom_frequency_type
parameters.description: Custom frequency type. Valid only when type is CUSTOM . Enum: N_MINTUE_Y_TIMES N_HOUR_Y_TIMES N_DAY_Y_TIMES

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: It is the N in custom_frequency_type

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: It is the Y in custom_frequency_type

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: Notification settings

parameters.name: notification_type
parameters.description: Notification type you need. Enum values: TASK_FINISH : Notification will be sent when the task is finished. This option is only for MESSAGE subject type. ANY_CHANGES : If the subject_type for the action is not MESSAGE but you still want to receive emails, use this option. NOT_NOTIFICATION : No notifications are needed.

parameters.name: email_setting
parameters.description: Email notification settings

parameters.name: notification_period
parameters.description: Enum values: EVERY_TIME TIME_SCHEDULE : notifications will be sent together around a specified time.

parameters.name: email_exec_time
parameters.description: Required when notification_period is TIME_SCHEDULE . Notification email sent time. For example, "12:00".

parameters.name: no_result_notification
parameters.description: It will be set as false by default if not provided, meaning no notification will be sent if there is no result.

parameters.name: mute_option
parameters.description: This field can be used to mute or unmute email notification for the day. Enum values: MUTE UNMUTE

parameters.name: rule_exec_info
parameters.description: Rule run settings.

parameters.name: exec_time_type
parameters.description: When the rule will be run. Enum values: PER_HALF_HOUR : the rule will be run every half hour. CUSTOM : the rule will be run at a customized time (specified in the exec_time field). HALF_HOUR_IN_SPECIFIC_TIME_PERIOD : the rule will be run every 30 minutes during specified time range on specifed days during the week. SPECIFIC_TIME_ACCURATE_ONCE : the rule will be run only once at a customized time (specified in the exec_time field).

parameters.name: exec_time
parameters.description: If exec_time_type is set to CUSTOM or SPECIFIC_TIME_ACCURATE_ONCE , use this field to specify the exact time when the rule will be run. Format: "HH:MM" when exec_time_type is CUSTOM . For example: "12:00". "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM" when exec_time_type is SPECIFIC_TIME_ACCURATE_ONCE . For example: "2023-04-20 04:20". Note : If exec_time_type = SPECIFIC_TIME_ACCURATE_ONCE , the exec_time cannot exceed one year from the current time.

parameters.name: time_period_info
parameters.description: Valid when exec_time_type is HALF_HOUR_IN_SPECIFIC_TIME_PERIOD . It has start_time , end_time , date_type and num to specify the time period information.

parameters.name: num Conditional
parameters.description: Required when date_type is WEEK or MONTH . Each number in the list represents the day in the week or month. When date_type is WEEK , value range for this field is [1, 7], meaning Monday to Sunday. When date_type is MONTH , value range for this field is [1, 28], meaning 1st day to the 28th day of the month.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time of this time period. For example, "12:00".

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time of this time period. For example, "12:00".

parameters.name: date_type
parameters.description: Type of date. Enum values: DAY , WEEK , MONTH .

parameters.name: tzone
parameters.description: User timezone. In create/update rules, it's used with mute_option in notification.email_setting. For acceptable timezone code, see Time Zone .

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the rule.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language of the error messages. Enum values: ZH (Simplified Chinese), EN (English)(default), JA (Japanese).

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: rule_ids
fields.description: IDs of the rules that have been created or updated.
